entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or freezing drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
